javadoc:
A dynamic data type that changes the number of elements it contains based on a count found in
 header data type.
 The data type has a header data type which will contain the number of base data types following
 the header data type.
 
 NOTE: This is a special Dynamic data-type which can only appear as a component
 created by a Dynamic data-type

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructor for this dynamic data type builder.

params.name: name
params.comment: name of this dynamic data type

params.name: header
params.comment: header data type that will contain the number of following elements

params.name: baseStruct
params.comment: base data type for each of the following elements

params.name: counterOffset
params.comment: offset of the number of following elements from the start of the header

params.name: counterSize
params.comment: size of the count in bytes

params.name: mask
params.comment: mask to apply to the count value to get the actual number of following elements.

methods.name: getCount
methods.comment: Extract the size of the data type from the given location in memory

params.name: memory
params.comment: the memory to get the size from

params.name: loc
params.comment: the address in memory where the size is located

name: CountedDynamicDataType
comment:
A dynamic data type that changes the number of elements it contains based on a count found in
 header data type.
 The data type has a header data type which will contain the number of base data types following
 the header data type.
 
 NOTE: This is a special Dynamic data-type which can only appear as a component
 created by a Dynamic data-type
